areas.name: CJ's
areas.description: commited to great food, great coffee, great service, an experience that will make your time with us fabulous. All visuals are serving suggestions only.

areas.name: Jiko Restaurant
areas.description: Inspired by the open flame grill, the seasonal menu is a tribute to local farmers; paying homage to crisp flavors and fresh, organic ingredients. Jiko authentically uplifts its inspirations while offering guests the delights of whimsy and fantasy through a playful approach to presentation.

areas.name: Slate - Kitchen & Bar
areas.description: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Nairobi's Westlands, our bar stands as the pulsating core of our culinary journey, where the eclectic beats of French-Afro-Asian

areas.name: hero restaurant
areas.description: Hero is a new kind of eatery; at the intersection of design, fantasy, indulgence and individuality. Built as a speakeasy with a discrete entrance and prohibition-style bar; the concept invites the guests to be members of a secret space.

areas.name: Harvest Restaurant
areas.description: Harvest is a tribute to local farmers, crisp flavours and fresh organic ingredients. Creations by Executive Chef Luca Pintus and his team.

areas.name: Inca Restaurant
areas.description: Perched in the vibrant heart of Nairobi's Hurlingham area, Inca Restaurant beckons with its irresistible blend of Peruvian cuisine and contemporary flair.

areas.name: Seven Seafood & Grill
areas.description: Redefining the flavors of local produce with every dish… Experience the magic at Seven Seafood & Grill – Kenya’s Premier Steakhouse & Seafood Restaurant.

areas.name: The carnivore restaurant
areas.description: Carnivore is an open-air restaurant in the Langata suburb of Nairobi, Kenya. Carnivore's specialty is meat, and features an all-you-can-eat meat buffet. They serve a wide variety of meat and were famous for their game meat until Kenya

areas.name: Urban Eatery
areas.description: Offering an energized atmosphere in the heart of Nairobi, Urban Eatery consists of four different kitchens and our signature bar, with menus spanning from tasty early morning bites to more substantial evening feasts.

areas.name: Five Senses Restaurant
areas.description: Five Senses Restaurant is a family-run casual fine dining restaurant situated on 2nd Floor Galana Plaza along Galana Road in Kilimani Area, Nairobi.

areas.name: Mawimbi Seafood Restaurant
areas.description: . By joining us at Mawimbi, you’ll savor the world’s finest seafood in a breathtaking setting, Create life-changing connections and make unforgettable memories at the world’s finest luxury Seafood Restaurant

areas.name: Talisman Restaurant
areas.description: Featuring carved wooden pillars from Pakistan, elegant Afghan rugs, charming fireplaces, sprawling terraces and idyllic gardens, The Talisman blends fine dining with unbridled eclecticism. We have made every effort to create the ideal ambience for those seeking a candle-lit romantic dinner, a casual evening drink with friends, an outdoor lunch with family and everything in between.

areas.name: Mama Oliech Restaurant
areas.description: MAMA OLIECH RESTAURANT is located in Murcus Garvey Road in chaka yaya centre.our RESTAURANT is specialised in African dishes mainly Fish from lake Victoria

areas.name: Bambino - Kitchen & Bar
areas.description: Located on the ground floor of the Delta Towers in Westlands, Nairobi, the lavish restaurant with a modern setting seeks to redefine your dining experience.

areas.name: INTI - A Nikkei Experience
areas.description: Inti - a Nikkei Experience. INTI is the reflection of the Japanese influence on the Peruvian gastronomy. The ingredients of both cultures complement each other as if they had been born to be one. It is an honest cuisine with unique textures and flavors.

areas.name: Two Rivers
areas.description: Two Rivers Mall is a shopping centre located in Nairobi, Kenya. With 67,000 sqm of gross lettable area, it is the largest shopping mall in sub-Saharan Africa outside of South Africa.

areas.name: The Junction Mall
areas.description: The Junction Mall is home to over 90 local and international retail stores, exclusive boutiques, fashion, dining, and unparalleled entertaining events in Nairobi. The Mall offers an easy-to-navigate layout for the ultimate all-in-one shopping experience. Conveniently accessible from either Ngong Road or Riara Road, the mall provides over 800 secure parking bays. Visit The Junction Mall for an All About You shopping experience!

areas.name: Garden City Mall
areas.description: Garden City Mall is a shopping centre located in Kasarani in Nairobi, Kenya. With 33,500 sqm of gross retail space area, it is the second largest shopping centre in Kenya.

areas.name: Westgate Shopping Mall
areas.description: Westgate, Nairobi’s premier shopping mall is East Africa’s finest shopping, leisure and pleasure destination. Lots of daily, weekly and monthly entertainment for the whole family; Westgate is the only shopping mall in East Africa that has shoppers engaged in exciting and enlightening events for all.

areas.name: Lavington Mall
areas.description: Prime shopping centre/ Mall in the suburbs of LAVINGTON. Plenty choice of Luxury clothing brands, gourmet restaurants, café's and bars. Entertainment center with children play areas, classy bars and liquor stores. Not forgetting our famous Earthed ORGANIX market and Masai market every Saturday.

areas.name: Prestige Plaza Shopping Mall
areas.description: Prestige Plaza, is one of the first modern shopping centres in Nairobi having opened its doors in 2003. Unique in its design and convenient in its location away from the hustle and bustle of the City Centre, we are located on Ngong Road. Prestige Plaza is one of the more modern shopping centres in Nairobi recognised as a “one-stop shopping destination

areas.name: Yaya Centre
areas.description: Yaya is a shopping centre located in Hurlingham in Nairobi, Kenya. The establishment had been an asset for the Nicholas Biwott business empire until 2023 when it was announced that the Kantaria family had acquired it at undisclosed amount.

areas.name: Sarit
areas.description: The Sarit Centre Mall, strategically located in the bustling Westlands area of Nairobi, stands as a versatile shopping and entertainment hub that offers something for everyone. With its extensive selection of stores spread across multiple floors, this mall serves as an ideal shopping destination.

areas.name: Greenhouse Mall
areas.description: The atmosphere is good,clean and bright..Definitely cheerful and a nice place to enjoy the sun or climate and still have a good time all at once.Easily accessible on Ngong Road,can barely miss it.Just refreshing

areas.name: The Hub Karen
areas.description: The Hub is located in Karen but still quite accessible. If you are coming from Kikuyu, there are matatus that will take you directly to the hub as they have a main stage here. From the CBD, I guess you take those going to Ngong and drop off at the police station.

areas.name: Karura Forest
areas.description: The Karura Forest Reserve is an urban upland forest on the outskirts of Nairobi, the capital of Kenya. This remarkable geographical location and natural

areas.name: Ngong Road Forest Sanctuary
areas.description: Ngong Forest is one of the few natural forests in the capital city of Kenya. It is located along Ngong Road, 6 kilometres from Nairobi's central business district.

areas.name: The Oloolua Nature Trail
areas.description: Oloolua Nature Trail in Kenya is located in Karen Neighbourhood in Nairobi in the indigenous tropical dry Oloolua forest in Kenya. Oloolua Forest in Kenya has

areas.name: Giraffe Centre Nature Trail
areas.description: Take a stroll, or hike if you're up to it, in our serene 1.5-kilometre nature trail and see how many species of bird you can spot – the record in one stroll is ...

areas.name: Nairobi Safari Walk
areas.description: Elevated wooden boardwalk winding through a safari park with lions, rhinos, cheetahs & leopards.

areas.name: Nairobi National Park
areas.description: Nairobi National Park is a national park in Kenya that was established in 1946 about 7 km south of Nairobi. It is fenced on three sides, whereas the open southern boundary allows migrating wildlife to move between the park and the adjacent Kitengela plains. Herbivores gather in the park during the dry season.

areas.name: Snake Park
areas.description: During your safari to the Nairobi Snake Park you can get the opportunity to handle non venomous juvenile pythons, house snakes and tortoise (hatchlings) with ..

areas.name: The Nairobi Arboretum
areas.description: An arboretum is a place holding living collection of plants for the purposes of scientific research, conservation, display and education (Wyse Jackson 1999). Nairobi Arboretum is a 30.4 hectares of wooded landscape, an oasis close to the heart of the city situated in the Kilimani area, about 3 km from city centre and adjacent to the State House. It is bounded by the Kirichwa Kubwa River, Arboretum Drive  and Kenya Girl Guide Headquarters

areas.name: Nairobi Mamba Village
areas.description: An arboretum is a place holding living collection of plants for the purposes of scientific research, conservation, display and education (Wyse Jackson 1999). Nairobi Arboretum is a 30.4 hectares of wooded landscape, an oasis close to the heart of the city situated in the Kilimani area, about 3 km from city centre and adjacent to the State House. It is bounded by the Kirichwa Kubwa River, Arboretum Drive  and Kenya Girl Guide Headquarters

areas.name: Uhuru Park
areas.description: Uhuru Park is a 12.9 hectare recreational park adjacent to the central business district of Nairobi, Kenya. It was opened to the general public by the late Mzee Jomo Kenyatta on 23 May 1969.
